reviews.review_msg: Took this course in distance format. He gave very very very tough exams especially the final exam. Exams are irrelevant to both the textbook and his notes. I survived because we have an easy marker. Midterm avg was like 62% and I think he scaled the final exam a lot . Not recommend this prof for a first year prof

Glyn loves to talk about his research which I found super interesting. Course content was simple enough and interesting, but the lab content was really tough, so give yourself lots of time to study for that! Lectures posted online so was okay missing some lectures, but emphasizes stuff on exams so it's helpful to attend. By and large loved it!

Lectures give you the general gist. Textbook is optional but still useful. Overall a course on the harder side due to a small number of people who are actually interested in GEOLOGY. It's not hard if you're either interested or study hard. The reason it's hard for the majority is prob b/c they expect to learn the basics and not the mechanisms.
awesome professor! very passionate and helpful. he was very clear with what would be on midterm and final. pay attention and you are good to go. always there for help. i recommend his class

I took this course as my 2nd elective course. Don`t take this course, if you dont need it.completly useless.it is even harder than any 4th year Ensc course.Professor thinks he is teaching quantum physics and he is trying too hard to show that the course is really Important . Just don't take this course if you don't need it.trust me

Awesome prof.  Very passionate about the subject and makes you want to know more!  He is energetic in lecture and a very intelligent dude.  Always available for help, answers questions thoroughly and in a way you can understand!  I would take another class with him in a second.

great prof. very helpful and he tries to help whenever he can. since the midterm mark was really low, he gave students the option to combine the midterm percentile with the final... not many profs will give a second chance like he does

absolutely amazing prof. he was very enthusiastic and clear in lectures. this is certainly not a course you can breeze through unless you took geology in highschool but both himself and the ta's are very helpful. i recommend taking any course with this guy because he doesnt bs you and he's also really friendly
He is very interested in what he teaches and very willing to explain things you do not understand. His midterm will be the end of your mark though.

Good prof. Don't take Easc101 thinking it's an easy course. It's not. i got pwned. The course itself is boring and useless if you arent pursuring geology. I got a C in this class. The labs were 80% guesswork imo. I wouldnt recommend anyone to take this course. 104 may be more interesting however.
Good teacher but the exams are very hard.  You have to memorize the whole textbook to do well on the midterm and final.
